body:
I thought that there was only 1 ITB branch. Now that I know there are
multiple, we can put release updates on their own ITB branch to be
merged in on release day.


On 11/22/2017 02:18 PM, Brian Bockelman wrote:
>
> But that's the point of the ITB branch, no? Basically have a branch
> that is ready to be merged in with the entire collection of updates
> (release notes and otherwise) on release day.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/opensciencegrid/docs/pull/260#issuecomment-346462565>,
> or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AHCS4HdWbIByTqID5XSjlMTgXqrMIhbrks5s5IGVgaJpZM4QmbzA>.
>

Tim Theisen
